kreport.name: cmdbmboss

cross.col-field: 设备分类,类型序号:设备类型,厂家

kreport.ksql:
select dd.ordernum as 序号 ,dd.data_name as 分类 ,bus_i.f_display_name as 业务系统 ,'设备类型' as 设备分类 ,'主机服务器' as 设备类型 ,'1' as 类型序号 ,decode(d.f_oem,2722,'HP',2723,'IBM',2724,'SUN','其他') 厂家 ,count(*) 数量 from cmdb_host h ,cmdb_hardware_device d ,cmdb_configuration_item i ,cmdb_businesssystem bus ,cmdb_configuration_item bus_i ,cmdb_r_ci_relation re ,cmdb_data_dictionary dd where i.id = h.id and i.id = d.id and bus.id = bus_i.id and h.id = re.f_start_ci_id and re.f_end_ci_id = bus.id and dd.data_group = 'as_type' and dd.data_value = bus.f_type #[and re.f_end_ci_id in (${BusinessSytem})] group by dd.ordernum ,dd.data_name ,bus_i.f_display_name ,decode(d.f_oem,2722,'HP',2723,'IBM',2724,'SUN','其他')
union
select dd.ordernum as 序号 ,dd.data_name as 分类 ,bus_i.f_display_name as 业务系统 ,'设备类型' as 设备分类 ,'存储阵列' as 设备类型 ,'2' as 类型序号 ,decode(d.f_oem,2722,'HP',2723,'IBM',2724,'SUN','其他') 厂家 ,count(*) 数量 from cmdb_disk_array h ,cmdb_hardware_device d ,cmdb_configuration_item i ,cmdb_businesssystem bus ,cmdb_configuration_item bus_i ,cmdb_r_ci_relation re ,cmdb_data_dictionary dd where i.id = h.id and i.id = d.id and bus.id = bus_i.id and h.id = re.f_start_ci_id and re.f_end_ci_id = bus.id and dd.data_group = 'as_type' and dd.data_value = bus.f_type #[and re.f_end_ci_id in (${BusinessSytem})] group by dd.ordernum ,dd.data_name ,bus_i.f_display_name ,decode(d.f_oem,2722,'HP',2723,'IBM',2724,'SUN','其他') union select dd.ordernum as 序号 ,dd.data_name as 分类 ,bus_i.f_display_name as 业务系统 ,'设备类型' as 设备分类 ,decode(i.f_category_id,12,'交换机',14,'路由器') as 设备类型 ,decode(i.f_category_id,12,'3',14,'4') as 类型序号 ,'' 厂家 ,count(*) 数量 from cmdb_configuration_item i ,cmdb_businesssystem bus ,cmdb_configuration_item bus_i ,cmdb_r_ci_relation re ,cmdb_data_dictionary dd where bus.id = bus_i.id and i.id = re.f_start_ci_id and re.f_end_ci_id = bus.id and dd.data_group = 'as_type' and dd.data_value = bus.f_type and i.f_category_id in( 12,14) #[and re.f_end_ci_id in (${BusinessSytem})] group by dd.ordernum ,dd.data_name ,bus_i.f_display_name ,decode(i.f_category_id,12,'3',14,'4') ,decode(i.f_category_id,12,'交换机',14,'路由器')
